price: Yoo isaan gara galan “ani isin sodaachiseera iyyansa (hamaa), akka iyyansa ummata Aadiifi Samuudin” jedhiin.
arabic: فَإِنۡ أَعۡرَضُواْ فَقُلۡ أَنذَرۡتُكُمۡ صَٰعِقَةٗ مِّثۡلَ صَٰعِقَةِ عَادٖ وَثَمُودَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.
